Import ZIP Shapefiles

Paste in a list of ZIP codes your site will cover. (This form will ignore any text, commas, etc., it just extracts any 5-digit codes to use.) OpenBlock will download and install shapefiles from the U.S. Census Bureau for them. This is usually only needed during the initial install of OpenBlock, but you can run it multiple times for multiple states or to add more zips later.
